trans-unit.source: Exposes the items in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector" /> to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expõe os itens na coleção <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector" /> para Automação da Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The item object that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SelectorItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de item associado a esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SelectorItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SelectorAutomationPeer" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector" /> that holds the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SelectorAutomationPeer" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector" /> que contém a coleção <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" />.

trans-unit.source: Provides initialization for base class values when they are called by the constructor of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a inicialização para valores de classe base quando chamados pelo construtor de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern that is associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" />, this method returns the current instance of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SelectorItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> for <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" />, esse método retornará a instância atual desse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SelectorItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo ou membro dá suporte à infraestrutura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e não se destina a ser usado diretamente do código.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is selected; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o elemento for selecionado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.
